basic_info.description: ðŸ‘‹ I'm Shreyas Pangal. I am a Front-End Web Developer, inspired to create web apps and build user experiences. I'm working with front-end frameworks like React and Material UI. I am currently undergoing a bootcamp at Crio.do for Full Stack Web Development - learning MERN stack.

projects.title: QKart Frontend
projects.description: One of the first e-commerce apps I was working on my bootcamp. This project helped me understand frontend development using React.js and built a frontend for an E-commerce application. I've learned a lot about react hooks, authentication and how to integrate it seamlessly with Material UI.

projects.title: Crio Newsfeed
projects.description: Crio News Feed website is an aggregator which aggregates news content from different websites in one place. It consists of news articles grouped under various topics such as Technology, Politics, Sports etc. I developed this project using HTML, CSS, Bootstrap and JavaScript.

projects.title: QTrip
projects.description: QTrip is a dynamic travel website where you can find Itinerary details of particular tour and filter locations and experiences according to your needs.
